sourcesContent:
Inactive Users

  • {{ user }} | Set to Active
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { userDataService } from '../services/userData.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inactive-users', templateUrl: './inactive-users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inactive-users.component.css'] }) export class InactiveUsersComponent implements OnInit { users: string[] = []; constructor (private userDataService : userDataService) {} ngOnInit() { this.users = this.userDataService.inactiveUsers; } onSetToActive(id: number) { this.userDataService.onSetToActive(id); } }
